t: How to Correctly Register Brand on Amazon in 5 Steps
s: Once you have gathered all of the required documentation, you can begin the registration process by going to https://brandservices.amazon.com/ clicking on the “Brand Registry” button. If you already have an Amazon seller account, then sign in using those credentials.
